<ce:para view="all">
<ce:italic>Synthesis of [Ag(PyBIm)</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>
<ce:italic>H</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>2</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>O]</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>
<ce:italic>NO</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>3</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>(</ce:italic>
<ce:bold>
<ce:italic>1</ce:italic>
</ce:bold>
<ce:italic>).</ce:italic> An acetonitrile (5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) solution of AgNO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf> (0.085<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.50<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was slowly diffused into an ethanol (5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) solution of PyBIm (0.097<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.50<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol). Colorless crystals formed in about two weeks (80% yield) <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>AgN<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 37.62; H, 2.89; N, 14.62. Found: C, 37.15; H, 3.12; N, 14.13%. IR (KBr pellet, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3434s, 1613s, 1559w, 1537w, 1495m, 1480w, 1443, 1414, 1385s, 1357s, 1229m, 1072m, 1041m, 1017w, 838m, 821m, 782s, 700m, 556m, 502w.</ce:para><ce:para view="all">
<ce:italic>Synthesis of [Ag(PyBIm)</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>
<ce:italic>H</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>2</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>O]</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>
<ce:italic>ClO</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>4</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>(</ce:italic>
<ce:bold>
<ce:italic>2</ce:italic>
</ce:bold>
<ce:italic>).</ce:italic> An ethanol solution (5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) of AgClO<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf> (0.06<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.30<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) was slowly diffused into an ethanol solution of PyBIm (0.06<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.30<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol). Colorless crystals formed in about three weeks (75% yield). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>AgClN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>: C, 34.27; H, 2.64; N, 9.99. Found: C, 34.15; H, 3.12; N, 10.13%. IR (KBr pellet, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3496s, 1612s, 1537w, 1494m, 1481w, 1436s, 1319m, 1285w, 1226m, 1120vs, 1085vs, 969w, 932w, 838m, 816m, 775s, 744w, 672w, 624s, 557w, 500w.</ce:para><ce:para view="all">
<ce:italic>Synthesis of</ce:italic> [<ce:italic>Ag</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>2</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>(PyBIm)</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>2</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>]</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>
<ce:italic>(SiF</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>6</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>)</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>
<ce:italic>2H</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>2</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:italic>O (</ce:italic>
<ce:bold>
<ce:italic>3</ce:italic>
</ce:bold>
<ce:italic>).</ce:italic> A solution of Ag<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>SiF<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf> (0.22<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.61<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), PyBIm (0.24<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1.22<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), NaF (0.025<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.61<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (15<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>ml) was stirred under ambient conditions, then sealed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel, heated at 150<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 5 days and cooled to room temperature. The resulting product was recovered by filtration, washed with distilled water and dried in air (65% yield). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">22</ce:inf>Ag<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>F<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>Si: C, 36.75; H, 2.83; N, 10.72. Found: C, 36.54; H, 3.09; N, 10.79%. IR (KBr pellet, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3445s, 1614s, 1560w, 1541m, 1496w, 1481w, 1439s, 1384w, 1319m, 1287w, 1227m, 1118s, 1084s, 1065s, 1022s, 839m, 818m, 775s, 745s, 558m, 500w, 473m.</ce:para><ce:para view="all">
<ce:italic>Synthesis of [Ag(PyBIm)(HBDC)] (</ce:italic>
<ce:bold>
<ce:italic>4</ce:italic>
</ce:bold>
<ce:italic>).</ce:italic> A solution of Ag<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.069<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.30<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), PyBIm (0.24<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1.22<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>BDC (0.101<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.61<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (15<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>ml) was stirred under ambient conditions, then sealed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel, heated at 150<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 5 days and cooled to room temperature. The resulting product was recovered by filtration, washed with distilled water and dried in air (60% yield). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">20</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">14</ce:inf>AgN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 51.31; H, 3.01; N, 8.97. Found: C, 51.52; H, 3.26; N, 9.06%. IR (KBr pellet, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3433s, 1416s, 1566m, 1778w, 1438m, 1384s, 1319m, 1283w, 1228w, 1095w, 1069m, 936m, 839m, 751s, 687m, 539w, 507w.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of [Ag(PyBIm) ⋅ H  2  O] ⋅ NO  3  (  1  ). An acetonitrile (5mL) solution of AgNO3 (0.085g, 0.50mmol) was slowly diffused into an ethanol (5mL) solution of PyBIm (0.097g, 0.50mmol). Colorless crystals formed in about two weeks (80% yield) Anal. Calc. for C12H11AgN4O4: C, 37.62; H, 2.89; N, 14.62. Found: C, 37.15; H, 3.12; N, 14.13%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3434s, 1613s, 1559w, 1537w, 1495m, 1480w, 1443, 1414, 1385s, 1357s, 1229m, 1072m, 1041m, 1017w, 838m, 821m, 782s, 700m, 556m, 502w.

 Synthesis of [Ag(PyBIm) ⋅ H  2  O] ⋅ ClO  4  (  2  ). An ethanol solution (5mL) of AgClO4 (0.06g, 0.30mmol) was slowly diffused into an ethanol solution of PyBIm (0.06g, 0.30mmol). Colorless crystals formed in about three weeks (75% yield). Anal. Calc. for C12H11AgClN3O5: C, 34.27; H, 2.64; N, 9.99. Found: C, 34.15; H, 3.12; N, 10.13%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3496s, 1612s, 1537w, 1494m, 1481w, 1436s, 1319m, 1285w, 1226m, 1120vs, 1085vs, 969w, 932w, 838m, 816m, 775s, 744w, 672w, 624s, 557w, 500w.

 Synthesis of [Ag  2  (PyBIm)  2  ] ⋅ (SiF  6  ) ⋅ 2H  2  O (  3  ). A solution of Ag2SiF6 (0.22g, 0.61mmol), PyBIm (0.24g, 1.22mmol), NaF (0.025g, 0.61mmol) and H2O (15ml) was stirred under ambient conditions, then sealed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel, heated at 150°C for 5 days and cooled to room temperature. The resulting product was recovered by filtration, washed with distilled water and dried in air (65% yield). Anal. Calc. for C24H22Ag2F6N6O2Si: C, 36.75; H, 2.83; N, 10.72. Found: C, 36.54; H, 3.09; N, 10.79%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3445s, 1614s, 1560w, 1541m, 1496w, 1481w, 1439s, 1384w, 1319m, 1287w, 1227m, 1118s, 1084s, 1065s, 1022s, 839m, 818m, 775s, 745s, 558m, 500w, 473m.

 Synthesis of [Ag(PyBIm)(HBDC)] (  4  ). A solution of Ag2O (0.069g, 0.30mmol), PyBIm (0.24g, 1.22mmol), H2BDC (0.101g, 0.61mmol) and H2O (15ml) was stirred under ambient conditions, then sealed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel, heated at 150°C for 5 days and cooled to room temperature. The resulting product was recovered by filtration, washed with distilled water and dried in air (60% yield). Anal. Calc. for C20H14AgN3O4: C, 51.31; H, 3.01; N, 8.97. Found: C, 51.52; H, 3.26; N, 9.06%. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3433s, 1416s, 1566m, 1778w, 1438m, 1384s, 1319m, 1283w, 1228w, 1095w, 1069m, 936m, 839m, 751s, 687m, 539w, 507w.
